column4: Could anyone here help me on this? I did the update to edgy with update-manager -c and now there are some packages which can't be reconfigured (acpid, acpi-support, edubuntu-desktop) and the kernel installed is still the dapper kernel. Any ideas on how to solve this?
Nope. It ends with an error about the unconfigured packages acpid, acpi-support and edubuntu-desktop
